languages.text: "Я озарен светом Его как никогда! Вы поклоняетесь лжи, в то время как истинный Император желает для чад Своих иного!.." {n}Ему требуется усилие, чтобы вернуть самообладание.{/n} "Ваш свет — это тьма, {name}. И мне жаль, что вы не способны видеть правду".

traits.locale_text: "Лишиться? Я озарен светом Его как никогда! Вы поклоняетесь лжи, в то время как истинный Император желает для чад Своих иного!.." {n}Ему требуется усилие, чтобы вернуть самообладание.{/n} "Ваш свет — это тьма, {name}. И мне жаль, что вы не способны видеть правду".

languages.text: "I am bathed in His light as never before! You worship lies, while the true Emperor desires otherwise for his children!" {n}It takes an effort for him to regain his composure.{/n} "Your light is darkness, {name}. And I am sorry you are unable to see the truth."
languages.original_text: "Я озарен светом Его как никогда! Вы поклоняетесь лжи, в то время как истинный Император желает для чад Своих иного!.." {n}Ему требуется усилие, чтобы вернуть самообладание.{/n} "Ваш свет — это тьма, {name}. И мне жаль, что вы не способны видеть правду".

traits.locale_text: "I am bathed in His light as never before! You worship lies, while the true Emperor desires otherwise for his children!" {n}It takes an effort for him to regain his composure.{/n} "Your light is darkness, {name}. And I am sorry you are unable to see the truth."

"I am bathed in His light as never before! You worship lies, while the true Emperor desires otherwise for his children!" {n}It takes an effort for him to regain his composure.{/n} "Your light is darkness, {name}. And I am sorry you are unable to see the truth."

"I am bathed in His light as never before! You worship lies, while the true Emperor desires otherwise for his children!" {n}It takes an effort for him to regain his composure.{/n} "Your light is darkness, {name}. And I am sorry you are unable to see the truth."

"I am bathed in His light as never before! You worship lies, while the true Emperor desires otherwise for his children!" {n}It takes an effort for him to regain his composure.{/n} "Your light is darkness, {name}. And I am sorry you are unable to see the truth."

"I am bathed in His light as never before! You worship lies, while the true Emperor desires otherwise for his children!" {n}It takes an effort for him to regain his composure.{/n} "Your light is darkness, {name}. And I am sorry you are unable to see the truth."

languages.text: «¡Su luz me inunda como nunca antes! ¡Usted venera una red de mentiras, el verdadero Emperador tiene otros deseos para su gente!». {n}Le cuesta recuperar la compostura.{/n} «Su luz trae oscuridad, {name}. Lamento que no pueda ver la verdad».
languages.original_text: "I am bathed in His light as never before! You worship lies, while the true Emperor desires otherwise for his children!" {n}It takes an effort for him to regain his composure.{/n} "Your light is darkness, {name}. And I am sorry you are unable to see the truth."

traits.locale_text: «¡Su luz me inunda como nunca antes! ¡Usted venera una red de mentiras, el verdadero Emperador tiene otros deseos para su gente!». {n}Le cuesta recuperar la compostura.{/n} «Su luz trae oscuridad, {name}. Lamento que no pueda ver la verdad».

languages.text: 「私は、かつてないほど主の光を浴びている！そちらは嘘を崇拝しているが、真の皇帝は子供たちに逆の事を望んでいるのだ！」{n}彼が落ち着くまでには時間が掛かった。{/n}「その光は闇だ、{name}。真実を見ることができなくて残念です」
languages.original_text: "I am bathed in His light as never before! You worship lies, while the true Emperor desires otherwise for his children!" {n}It takes an effort for him to regain his composure.{/n} "Your light is darkness, {name}. And I am sorry you are unable to see the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、かつてないほど主の光を浴びている！そちらは嘘を崇拝しているが、真の皇帝は子供たちに逆の事を望んでいるのだ！」{n}彼が落ち着くまでには時間が掛かった。{/n}「その光は闇だ、{name}。真実を見ることができなくて残念です」

languages.text: “我沐浴在他的明光之中，我的信仰前所未有地圣洁！你崇拜谎言，但真正的帝皇为祂的子民带来了真理！”{n}他花了很长时间，才恢复原本的平静。{/n}“你所谓的光芒正是黑暗，{name}。你对真相视而不见，我为此很是遗憾。”
languages.original_text: "I am bathed in His light as never before! You worship lies, while the true Emperor desires otherwise for his children!" {n}It takes an effort for him to regain his composure.{/n} "Your light is darkness, {name}. And I am sorry you are unable to see the truth."

traits.locale_text: “我沐浴在他的明光之中，我的信仰前所未有地圣洁！你崇拜谎言，但真正的帝皇为祂的子民带来了真理！”{n}他花了很长时间，才恢复原本的平静。{/n}“你所谓的光芒正是黑暗，{name}。你对真相视而不见，我为此很是遗憾。”

languages.text: "Ich bade wie nie zuvor in Seinem Licht! Eure Verehrung ist eine Lüge, während der wahre Imperator andere Pläne für seine Kinder hat." {n}Es fällt ihm sichtlich schwer, die Fassung zu wahren.{/n} "Euer Licht ist Dunkelheit, {name}. Und ich bedaure sehr, dass Ihr die Wahrheit nicht sehen könnt."
languages.original_text: "I am bathed in His light as never before! You worship lies, while the true Emperor desires otherwise for his children!" {n}It takes an effort for him to regain his composure.{/n} "Your light is darkness, {name}. And I am sorry you are unable to see the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bade wie nie zuvor in Seinem Licht! Eure Verehrung ist eine Lüge, während der wahre Imperator andere Pläne für seine Kinder hat." {n}Es fällt ihm sichtlich schwer, die Fassung zu wahren.{/n} "Euer Licht ist Dunkelheit, {name}. Und ich bedaure sehr, dass Ihr die Wahrheit nicht sehen könnt."

languages.text: « Je baigne dans Sa lumière comme jamais auparavant ! Vous vénérez des mensonges, et ce n'est pas là ce que désire le véritable Empereur pour ses enfants ! » {n}Il fait un effort visible pour retrouver son sang-froid.{/n} « Votre lumière n'est que ténèbres, {name}. Et cela me désole que vous soyez incapable de voir la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "I am bathed in His light as never before! You worship lies, while the true Emperor desires otherwise for his children!" {n}It takes an effort for him to regain his composure.{/n} "Your light is darkness, {name}. And I am sorry you are unable to see the truth."

traits.locale_text: « Je baigne dans Sa lumière comme jamais auparavant ! Vous vénérez des mensonges, et ce n'est pas là ce que désire le véritable Empereur pour ses enfants ! » {n}Il fait un effort visible pour retrouver son sang-froid.{/n} « Votre lumière n'est que ténèbres, {name}. Et cela me désole que vous soyez incapable de voir la vérité. »

languages.text: "Hiç olmadığı kadar, baştan aşağı O'nun ışığıyla doluyum! Senin inancın yalan söylüyor! Gerçek İmparator, çocukları için başka şeyler arzuluyor!" {n}Kendini toplamak için çaba göstermesi gerekiyor.{/n} "Senin ışığın karanlık {name}. Ve gerçeği göremediğin için çok üzgünüm."
languages.original_text: "I am bathed in His light as never before! You worship lies, while the true Emperor desires otherwise for his children!" {n}It takes an effort for him to regain his composure.{/n} "Your light is darkness, {name}. And I am sorry you are unable to see the truth."
